tts_direction_prompt: Perform the dialogue with a natural, expressive tone. Match the emotion to the context. Unless specified as 'whisper' in the text, speak clearly and at a normal volume.

Female_Energetic.description: Female, High energy, youthful, cheerful. Good for lively girls.

Male_Energetic.description: Male, High energy, youthful. Good for lively boys or comedy.

Female_Calm.description: Female, Calm, soothing. Good for narration or gentle characters.

Male_Calm.description: Male, Calm, soothing. Good for friendly conversation.

Male_Deep.description: Male, Deep, gravelly. Good for older characters or villains.

Female_Soft.description: Female, Soft, breathy. Use for shy characters.
